title: ACTION ENTERPRISE HOLDINGS LLC
contents:
The Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) was designed to provide a direct incentive for small businesses to keep their workers on the payroll. It ended in 2020.
Many borrowers are eligible for loan forgiveness.
As part of the Paycheck Protection Program, the following entity received a loan:
ACTION ENTERPRISE HOLDINGS LLC

LoanAmount
10,000,000
BusinessName
ACTION ENTERPRISE HOLDINGS LLC
Address
204 20TH ST N
City
BIRMINGHAM
State
AL
Zip
35203
NAICSCode
484220
BusinessType
Limited Liability Company(LLC)
RaceEthnicity
Unanswered
Gender
Unanswered
Veteran
Unanswered
NonProfit

JobsReported
499
DateApproved
04/15/2020
Lender
Regions Bank
CD
AL-07

Data Sources
The data come from a release of over 5,000,000 records by the SBA in November, 2020.
Who Could Apply?
The following entities affected by Coronavirus (COVID-19) may have been eligible:
Any small business concern that meets SBA’s size standards (either the industry based sized standard or the alternative size standard)
Sole proprietors, independent contractors, and self-employed persons
Any business with a NAICS Code that begins with 72 (Accommodations and Food Services) that has more than one physical location and employs less than 500 per location
Any business, 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, 501(c)(19) veterans organization, or Tribal business concern (sec. 31(b)(2)(C) of the Small Business Act) with the greater of:
500 employees, or
That meets the SBA industry size standard if more than 500

More info is available from the Small Business Administration.
Link one Link two Link three Link four

description:
Welcome to our new blog, Paycheck Protection Program. We hope you enjoy
